mr_api_execution.overview:
CRITICAL: Explicit, executable GitLab API workflow for MR data retrieval.
This rule file enforces API-first approach with NO git command-line fallbacks.
Complete executable workflow with curl commands defined in: ../../sdlc/shared/mr-api-execution-workflow.md
MANDATORY EXECUTION PATTERN: 1. Extract MR identifier from user request (IID, URL, or branch) 2. Source .env to load GIT_TOKEN, GITLAB_API_URL, GITLAB_PROJECT_ID 3. Execute GitLab API calls using curl with authentication 4. Parse JSON responses to extract MR data 5. Present results to user
PROHIBITED ACTIONS: - Using git log to find MR information - Using git branch to discover MR details - Falling back to git CLI when API calls are available - Assuming MR data without making API calls
mr_api_execution.enforcement: This workflow MUST be executed for ALL MR-related operations. NO exceptions. NO fallbacks to git commands for MR data.
